overview: A couple breaks as an imminent end of the world overwhelms these people with unfulfilled goals and unsatisfactory present. Hurrying to take a step before it's over, some assume their lousy employment status, others face panic and depression, and there are those who struggle with their own nonsense Internet exposure, facing loneliness in a city where no one looks sideways.
tagline: leave home, meet people, survive in a saturated city ... or let everything explode, and see what happens
title: granada y al paraiso
